mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memberchat(chat_id, user_id, chatroom_id, message_type, chat_message) VALUES (#{chatId}, #{userId}, #{chatroomId}, #{messageType}, #{chatMessage})
mapper.select: SELECT mc.*, m.user_nick FROM memberchat mc JOIN member m ON mc.user_id = m.user_id WHERE chatroom_id = #{chatroomId}
